name: PopUp (Solarim)
description:
As a soda can, reject your fate of being thrown away!

Press space to dash upward, but this will cost your limited soda.

No ground for you to rest! Just absorb other soda cans to restore your energy.

Boosters will sometimes appear, collect them to increase the amount of soda cans and rare golden cans!

This game is very much inspired by flappy-bird, and I get helped a lot by Mark's GMTK tutorial. Check this:

I enjoyed very much making my first indie game, and I hope you can also enjoy playing this game!

Oh, this was a game made for minijam#123. oh shoot, totally forgets about the theme.
